instructions.no-peers-title: Open PairDrop on other devices to send files
instructions.no-peers-subtitle: Pair devices or enter a public room to be discoverable on other networks
instructions.x-instructions_desktop: Click to send files or right click to send a message
instructions.x-instructions_mobile: Tap to send files or long tap to send a message
instructions.activate-share-mode-base: Open PairDrop on other devices to send
instructions.webrtc-requirement: To use this PairDrop instance, WebRTC must be enabled!

footer.on-this-network_title: You can be discovered by everyone on this network.
footer.paired-devices_title: You can be discovered by paired devices at all times independent of the network.
footer.public-room-devices_title: You can be discovered by devices in this public room independent of the network.

dialogs.input-key-on-this-device: Input this key on another device
dialogs.enter-key-from-another-device: Enter key from another device here.
dialogs.input-room-id-on-another-device: Input this room ID on another device
dialogs.enter-room-id-from-another-device: Enter room ID from another device to join room.
dialogs.auto-accept-instructions-2: to automatically accept all files sent from that device.
dialogs.public-room-qr-code_title: Click to copy link to public room
dialogs.pair-devices-qr-code_title: Click to copy link to pair this device
dialogs.share-text-checkbox: Always show this dialog when sharing text

about.claim: The easiest way to transfer files across devices

notifications.display-name-changed-temporarily: Display name is changed for this session only
notifications.display-name-random-again: Display name is randomly generated again
notifications.pairing-tabs-error: Pairing two web browser tabs is impossible
notifications.pair-url-copied-to-clipboard: Link to pair this device copied to clipboard
notifications.room-url-copied-to-clipboard: Link to public room copied to clipboard
notifications.notifications-permissions-error: Notifications permission has been blocked as the user has dismissed the permission prompt several times. This can be reset in Page Info which can be accessed by clicking the lock icon next to the URL bar.
notifications.link-received: Link received by {{name}} - Click to open
notifications.message-received: Message received by {{name}} - Click to copy
notifications.copied-text-error: Writing to clipboard failed. Copy manually!
notifications.online-requirement-pairing: You need to be online to pair devices
notifications.online-requirement-public-room: You need to be online to create a public room
notifications.ios-memory-limit: Sending files to iOS is only possible up to 200 MB at once
notifications.unfinished-transfers-warning: There are unfinished transfers. Are you sure you want to close PairDrop?
notifications.rate-limit-join-key: Rate limit reached. Wait 10 seconds and try again.

peer-ui.click-to-send: Click to send files or right click to send a message
peer-ui.connection-hash: To verify the security of the end-to-end encryption, compare this security number on both devices
